abstract: Disclosed is a method for training memristive learning systems (MLSs) using stochastic learning algorithms and the training system apparatus designed to implement the stochastic learning algorithms.
summary: <SOH> SUMMARY <EOH>In accordance with an aspect of the present disclosure, there is provided a method for training a memristive learning system including identifying a task that the memristive learning system is to be trained to perform; identifying a cost function; choosing a deterministic update equation; deriving a stochastic update equation from the deterministic update equation; designing a training system hardware to implement the derived stochastic update equation; coupling the memristive learning system to the training system; and training the memristive learning system. In accordance with an aspect of the present disclosure, there is provided a training system apparatus designed to implement stochastic learning algorithms.
title: Method and Apparatus for Training Memristive Learning Systems
